video_description_en:
Hi, I'm Minni!

My most important in Helsinki is to ensure that the overburdened social and healthcare services function effectively. Every Helsinki resident must have the right to timely care.

In Helsinki, we must make humane decisions based on research and evidence.

Letâ€™s work together to make Helsinki a model city â€“ one that others in Finland and even across Europe can look up to. Letâ€™s build the best city to live inâ€”for everyone.

election_promise_3.en:
A Business-Friendly Helsinki â€“ Less Bureaucracy, More Vitality!

âœ… More Flexible Permit Processes â€“ Streamlining permit procedures for entrepreneurs, especially for restaurants, event organizers, and small businesses, to make starting and running a business smoother.

âœ… Support and Services for Small Businesses â€“ Providing city-backed, tiered support, such as rental assistance for storefronts, to help small and new businesses grow and succeed.

âœ… The City as an Active Partner â€“ Strengthening cooperation with businesses in procurement, events, and innovation pilots to keep Helsinki a vibrant and attractive city.

I promise to promote an entrepreneur-friendly Helsinki, where businesses can operate, create jobs, and grow easily â€“ without unnecessary bureaucracy!

lifevalues.en:
âœ… Equality â€“ Everyone deserves a good life, regardless of background. I support timely healthcare, quality education and equal opportunities for all.

âœ… Freedom â€“ People should be able to make their own choices without excessive regulation. This means better substance abuse services over punishment and flexible solutions for business and housing.

âœ… Community â€“ Helsinki thrives together. I promote inviting public spaces, strong civil society, and support for local businesses to keep the city lively and open.

âœ… Sustainability â€“ The city must act responsibly by improving public transport, encouraging energy-efficient construction, and preserving biodiversity.

âœ… Fairness â€“ Decision-making must be transparent. Citizens' voices should be heard, and services directed to those who need them most.

election_promise_2.en:
Lower Housing Costs â€“ Helsinki Belongs to Everyone!

âœ… Faster Zoning and Building Permits â€“ Cutting unnecessary bureaucracy to bring new housing to the market more quickly and keep prices reasonable.

âœ… More Efficient Infill Development â€“ Utilizing unused plots and building more homes in existing urban centers to maintain a functional and vibrant city structure.

âœ… More Affordable Housing â€“ Expanding the city's rental housing production and enabling new housing models, such as communal living and housing cooperatives.

I promise to make Helsinki an accessible and diverse city to live in, where everyone can afford housing and entrepreneurship without an unreasonable financial burden.

representative_other.en:
I serve as the Vice Chair of Finland's Parliament's AIR (Assistants Without Borders), where we promote cross-party cooperation and advocate for the rights of parliamentary assistants.

Additionally, I am an alumnus of the National Union of Students in Finland (SAMOK), where I worked on student advocacy. I am also an alumnus of JEF Finland (Young European Federalists) and National Coalition Party Students (Kansalliset Ylioppilaat).

election_promise_1.en:
Smoother Healthcare â€“ Care When You Need It!

âœ… Faster Access to Care â€“ Strengthening cooperation between the public and private sectors to reduce waiting times and ensure that every Helsinki resident receives timely medical attention.

âœ… Prevention and Well-Functioning Health Centers â€“ Investing in primary healthcare to treat issues early and prevent conditions from worsening.

âœ… AI to Support Healthcare Work â€“ Utilizing AI-based solutions, such as dictation services for doctors, to free up more time for healthcare professionals to focus on patients.

âœ… More Skilled Professionals in Healthcare â€“ Increasing study placements and recruitment campaigns, especially for school counselors, psychologists, and nurses, to ensure everyone gets the help they need on time.

I promise to work towards ensuring that every Helsinki resident receives care when they need it â€“ smoothly and without unreasonable waiting times!

political_experience.en: I work in the Finnish Parliament as a political assistant and have held various positions of trust in organizations and student politics.  I have experience in EU and education policy from my work at SAMOK (The National Union of Students in Finland), as well as in political advocacy through my involvement with the National Coalition Party Students (Kokoomusopiskelijat) and Kansalliset Ylioppilaat.  Additionally, I have participated in several election campaigns, which has given me hands-on experience in political influence and campaigning.
